subtitle.subtitle: Hey, hey, hey! Don't touch my dog.

subtitle.subtitle: What's wrong with you? I'm just petting your dog.

subtitle.subtitle: Oh, hi. Hi. Excuse me!
subtitle.translation: - Chào. - Xin lỗi nhé.

subtitle.subtitle: She's a human being.
subtitle.translation: Con bé là người đó.

subtitle.subtitle: Yeah, did you like that?
subtitle.translation: Ừ, bà thích vậy không?

subtitle.subtitle: No, I didn't.
subtitle.translation: Không, tôi không thích.

subtitle.subtitle: I don't like you petting my dog either, and this is a human being as well.

subtitle.subtitle: Come on, Bruno.
subtitle.translation: Đi nào, Bruno.

subtitle.subtitle: Stop with the Charlie shit. His name's Bruno. It's Bruno.
subtitle.translation: Thôi gọi tên Charlie ngớ ngẩn đi, nhé? Tên nó là Bruno. Là Bruno đó.

subtitle.subtitle: His name's Charlie like his daddy named after me.
subtitle.translation: Tên nó là Charlie, bố nó đặt theo tên tôi.

subtitle.subtitle: His daddy?
subtitle.translation: Bố nó?

subtitle.subtitle: I'm his daddy, and his name is Bruno.
subtitle.translation: Tôi là bố nó này, và tên nó là Bruno.

subtitle.subtitle: Everybody on the block knows his name is Charlie. I named him.
subtitle.translation: Ai ở cái khu nhà này cũng biết tên nó là Charlie. Tôi đã đặt tên cho nó.

subtitle.translation: nó đều phản ứng lại với tôi.

subtitle.translation: Nó còn trông như Charlie nữa.

subtitle.subtitle: Stop calling my fucking dog Charlie, all right?

subtitle.subtitle: You understand? It's Bruno.

subtitle.subtitle: Watch the damn cart.
subtitle.translation: Đẩy xe cẩn thận.

subtitle.subtitle: Don't kick the motherfucking merchandise.
subtitle.translation: Đừng có mà đá vào đống hàng hóa.

subtitle.subtitle: You almost hit Bruno with that thing.
subtitle.translation: Suýt nữa đâm vào Bruno với cái xe đó đấy.

subtitle.subtitle: Well, Malcolm, maybe Bruno shouldn't take up so much space on the goddamn sidewalk.
subtitle.translation: Ồ Malcom, có lẽ là Bruno không nên chiếm nhiều diện tích vỉa hè như thế.

subtitle.subtitle: I got a business to run here.
subtitle.translation: Tôi còn phải làm kinh doanh.

subtitle.subtitle: A business? You call this a business?
subtitle.translation: Kinh doanh? Ông gọi cái này là kinh doanh ấy hả?

subtitle.subtitle: You're selling stolen shit out of a stolen shopping cart.
subtitle.translation: Ông bán mấy thứ ăn cắp trên cái xe đẩy ăn cắp.

subtitle.subtitle: What's all the accusations?
subtitle.translation: Buộc tội gì vậy?

subtitle.subtitle: I have you know Carl's cart is a certified vendor
subtitle.translation: Nói cho biết, tôi có giấy phép bán hàng rong cho xe hàng của Carl,

subtitle.subtitle: with a city-approved permit.
subtitle.translation: được cấp bởi thành phố đó.

subtitle.subtitle: Oh, okay. Let's see the permit.
subtitle.translation: Ồ, được rồi. Xem giấy phép nào.

subtitle.subtitle: I don't feel like going through the paperwork right now.
subtitle.translation: Giờ tôi không có hứng với mấy chuyện giấy tờ.

subtitle.subtitle: There's no city that's giving Crackhead Carl a permit to sell stolen shit.
subtitle.translation: Chả có cái thành phố nào cấp giấy phép cho Carl nghiện ngập để bán đồ ăn cắp đâu.

subtitle.subtitle: I would prefer you just call me Carl.
subtitle.translation: Tôi muốn anh gọi tôi là Carl.

subtitle.subtitle: The shit that I smoke does not need to be put in front of my name.
subtitle.translation: Cái thứ mà tôi hút không cần phải để ngay sau tên của tôi.

subtitle.subtitle: What if I called your dog ball-licking Bruno?
subtitle.translation: Thế nếu tôi gọi con chó của anh là, Bruno liếm bi thì sao?

subtitle.subtitle: Now, is there anything that you like?
subtitle.translation: Giờ, có gì ở đây anh thích không?

subtitle.translation: Mọi thứ đều chỉ năm đô la.
